oai_dc:dc.dc:title: GIS database for planning and monitoring of regional road network
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, AK
SIKDAR, PK
DHINGRA, SL
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: gis
database
planning
monitoring
regional
network
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper deals with development of a database for regional road network using the GIS-T software package 'TransCAD'. Three types of road (i.e. National Highway, State Highway and Major District Roads) have been considered for developing the GIS database. The database has been developed for each district which can be mosaiced to get the regional database. The usability of this database for planning and monitoring purposes like accessibility analysis, network improvement analysis and accident analysis has also been demonstrated.
